email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan as 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Also, can you confirm the vessel’s readiness and any additional terms? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and the laycan can be adjusted to 15-18 October. The vessel is currently in Singapore and will be ready to sail to Houston by the 10th. Terms are as per GENCON 94, with demurrage as discussed. Shall we proceed with the fixture? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the updates. We’re good to proceed at $48.50 per metric ton with the laycan of 15-18 October. Please send over the fixture recap, and we’ll finalize the paperwork. Appreciate your help! Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! Attached is the fixture recap for your review. To summarize: Vessel MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, Houston to Rotterdam, laycan 15-18 October, freight rate $48.50 per metric ton, demurrage $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if anything needs adjustment. Best regards, Sarah
